subject: Gold Cup (Soccer)
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Coach Jurgen Klinsmann must now plan how to approach a slate of international tournaments that will allow new players to shine, and will also work on developing his players’ assertiveness.
snippet: Coach Jurgen Klinsmann must now plan how to approach a slate of international tournaments that will allow new players to shine, and will also work on developing his players’ assertiveness.
